Holy hashtag!

Has it really been SEVEN years since Twitter fluttered into our lives?!

How did people even FUNCTION before its existence, LOLzz!

To celebrate this momentous occasion, Twitter's peeps released an adorable short video chronicling the microblogging site's growth since its inception.

Ch-ch-check out the charming visuals (above)!

Goodness, what a cold world it must have been where internet-connected humans couldn't concisely regale the world with every wish, whim, and witty insight (of 140 characters or less) that passed through their heads...

And just think of all those JUICY celebrity rants and heated feuds we would have missed if that bluebird had never been born! HA!!

Sending so many hearts to you guys over at Twitter! Happy Birthday!

item.content:encoded:
Uhhhh, what’s going on here?? Have these two reconciled?!

Caught smooching at an event in Beverly Hills on March 6th, Maria Shriver and ex-hubby Arnold Schwarzenegger seem to have reignited their 25 year old flame.

An insider revealed that the Terminator planted a passionate kiss on Maria’s lips:

“It was definitely not a peck... He kept his arm around her for most of the event.”

If you recall, Maria filed for divorce back in July, 2011, after learning of her husband’s secret son with their maid Mildred Baena. Cue the intrigue...

We can’t help but wonder -- is this wise, Maria? Especially after you just started to get your career ball rolling?

And need we remind you of THIS?

item.content:encoded:
Lindsay Lohan may be singing some Amy Winehouse before heading off to rehab. She’s got a date to keep with Charlie Sheen first!

The troubled actress, who was just sentenced to serve 90 days in a locked rehab facility, has been allowed to film her stint on Anger Management beforehand. And funny enough, she’ll be portraying a version of herself who develops feelings for her therapist, Charlie Sheen’s character.

Lindsay and Charlie’s relationship puzzles us. They’ve worked together before on Scary Movie 5, and the generous Anger Management actor has even given Lindsay $100,000 to pay off her taxes. And yet, the actress can't seem to show some gratitude.

Like we said, we're confused.

The episode is set to shoot next week, after which Lindsay will be going bye-bye.

How much trouble do you think she’ll cause between now and then?

[Image via Ivan Nikolov/Mr. Blue/WENN.]

item.content:encoded:
We are VERY curious indeed...

DID Lindsay Lohan's lawyer Mark Heller try to get her ex-assistant Gavin Doyle to LIE under oath, thus committing the crime of tampering with a witness?!?!

Well, according to GAVIN HIMSELF, these rumors are complete BULL POOP!

Lilo's former helper -- who was allegedly FIRED in a very rude manner right after Lindsay's high profile club "brawl" -- recently stated:

"I had no idea where all that came from. That never happened. [Heller] never came to me. I never met Mark Heller until Monday in court.

I heard that [Lindsay's father] Michael was saying we met in New York, and that all came out of the blue. He never spoke to me."

Well, good to know!

And even though Gavin has yet to actually meet with the DA to answer questions regarding Lindsay's lying-to-cops case, when he does, he apparantly maintains that he's only going to tell the TRUTH and nothing but the truth.

Gavin expressed:

"There’s nothing more to it than I’m just going to say no. I’m not going to lie. Lindsay and I have been through a lot. I know how this stuff goes."

If you recall, Mr. Doyle was the one riding shotgun with Lindz the day she smashed into an 18-wheeler on the PCH, and it was HIM that Lindsay claimed was driving...

So he's kinda the reason she's had to deal with this lying-to-cops case in the first place!

Well, that and the fact that she LIED to cops LOLz!

[Image via WENN.]
